scripts.build: npm run build-node && npm run build-browser
scripts.build-node: rm -rf dist-node; tsdx build --target node && mv dist dist-node
scripts.build-browser: rm -rf dist-browser; tsdx build --target web && browserify dist/appium-session-generator.cjs.development.js -o dist/appium-session-generator.cjs.development.browser.js && mv dist dist-browser
scripts.test: export TF_BROWSER_TEST=0 && tsdx test; unset TF_BROWSER_TEST
scripts.test-browser: export TF_BROWSER_TEST=1 && rm -rf test/browser/appium-session-generator.cjs.development.browser.js; npm run build-browser && mv dist-browser/appium-session-generator.cjs.development.browser.js test/browser/appium-session-generator.cjs.development.browser.js && tsdx test; rm -rf dist-browser; rm -rf test/browser/appium-session-generator.cjs.development.browser.js; unset TF_BROWSER_TEST
